1.0.name: wordpress/fay-emails-encoder
1.0.description:
Description: Encode emails to avoid spams. Template to use [@encode@ email="ilove@gmail.com" display="Gmail Lover"]

The result will be something like : <a href="mailto:&#105&#108ў&#046com">Gmail Lover</a>

See screenshots for more details.
